autobuild:
<command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/ace/config.h output='#define ACE_NTRACE 1
#define ACE_NDEBUG 1
#define ACE_NLOGGING 1
#define TAO_NTRACE 1
#define TAO_NDEBUG 1
#define TAO_NLOGGING 1
#define CIAO_NTRACE 1
#define CIAO_NDEBUG 1
#define CIAO_NLOGGING 1
#define DANCE_NTRACE 1
#define DANCE_NDEBUG 1
#define DANCE_NLOGGING 1
#define DDS4CCM_NTRACE 1
#define DDS4CCM_NDEBUG 1
#define DDS4CCM_NLOGGING 1
#include \x22ace/config-linux.h\x22
'"/> <command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/include/makeinclude/platform_macros.GNU output='valgrind=1
inline=0
dds4ccm_ndds=1
ndds=1
ssl=1
zlib=1
boost=1
ssl=1
qt4=1
ace_qt4reactor=1
tao_qtresource=1
QTDIR=/usr
PLATFORM_QT_LDFLAGS = -L$(QTDIR)/lib64
include $(ACE_ROOT)/include/makeinclude/platform_linux.GNU
'" /> <command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/bin/MakeProjectCreator/config/default.features output='boost=1
ssl=1
qt4=1
ndds=1
dds4ccm_ndds=1
xerces3=1
bzip2=1
zlib=1
'" />
